title: 89 57 12 "The Once & Future King""When the Kingdom's Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!"Transliteration: "Ōkoku no shihai owaru toki! Shinnen no hata wa eien ni" (Japanese:王国の支配終る時!信念の旗は永遠に) Junichi Fujise Michiru Shimada November 25, 2001(2001-11-25)[148] November 5, 2005[149]
